transcript: Warren Buffett said that the difference between really successful people and the most successful people this is me paraphrasing is that the most successful people say no to almost everything it's so simple and so hard which a lot of success habits are one of the things that Layla has been so good at helping me with and I think a lot of My Success earlier on was propelled by the fact that like when I met Laila I had a chiropractor agency a dental agency five gym locations a gym launch business where we did turn arounds I had all of those things going on and there was no CEO besides me I mean I made money from all of them but no income like everything was just enough to break even it was nine spinning plates I was so opportunistic and it's very classic new entrepreneur to just say yes to everything
